title: Repository that does not pass tests with Forge
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.1.0 (135cb12 2022-02-28T00:39:31.066361+00:00)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge t -m test_computeLPShares --optimize-runs 800 -vvvv --fork-block-number 13806816

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

Having seen that `yarn dapp-test` passed for this repo https://github.com/aloelabs/aloe-blend, I was curious to see if `forge test` would also pass. To my surprise, it didn't.

# Repro

```
export ETH_RPC_URL=https://eth-mainnet.alchemyapi.io/v2/<KEY>
# this passes
yarn test-dapp --verbosity=4 -m test_spec_computeLPShares
# this fails
forge t -m test_computeLPShares --optimize-runs 800 -vvvv --fork-block-number 13806816
```


## Dapp test output

```
dapp-test: rpc block: 13806816
Running 1 tests for contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:AloeBlendTest
[PASS] test_spec_computeLPShares() (gas: 9254)

Success: test_spec_computeLPShares
  contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:AloeBlendTest
   ├╴constructor
   ├╴setUp()
   │  ├╴create VolatilityOracleFake@0xCe71065D4017F316EC606Fe4422e11eB2c47c246 (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:90)
   │  │  └╴← 396 bytes of code
   │  ├╴create FactoryFake@0x185a4dc360CE69bDCceE33b3784B0282f7961aea (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:91)
   │  │  └╴← 24893 bytes of code
   │  └╴call 0x185a4dc360CE69bDCceE33b3784B0282f7961aea::create(@0xF1B63cD9d80f922514c04b0fD0a30373316dd75b, @0x8E35ec3f2C8e14bf7A0E67eA6667F6965938aD2d, @0x908f6DF3df3c25365172F350670d055541Ec362E) (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:92)
   │     ├╴create AloeBlendFake@0x9cC6334F1A7Bc20c9Dde91Db536E194865Af0067 (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:82)
   │     │  ├╴call 0xF1B63cD9d80f922514c04b0fD0a30373316dd75b::token0() (contracts/AloeBlend.sol:147)
   │     │  │  └╴← (@0x383518188C0C6d7730D91b2c03a03C837814a899)
   │     │  ├╴call 0x383518188C0C6d7730D91b2c03a03C837814a899::symbol() (contracts/AloeBlend.sol:147)
   │     │  │  └╴← ("OHM")

   │     │  │  └╴← (@0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2)

   │     │  │  └╴← (@0x383518188C0C6d7730D91b2c03a03C837814a899)
   │     │  ├╴call 0xF1B63cD9d80f922514c04b0fD0a30373316dd75b::token1() (contracts/UniswapHelper.sol:28)
   │     │  │  └╴← (@0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2)
   │     │  ├╴call 0xF1B63cD9d80f922514c04b0fD0a30373316dd75b::tickSpacing() (contracts/UniswapHelper.sol:29)
   │     │  │  └╴← (200)

   │     │  │  └╴← (VolatilityOracleFake@0xCe71065D4017F316EC606Fe4422e11eB2c47c246)
   │     │  └╴← 21450 bytes of code
   │     └╴← (@0x9cC6334F1A7Bc20c9Dde91Db536E194865Af0067)
   └╴test_spec_computeLPShares()
      ├╴call 0x9cC6334F1A7Bc20c9Dde91Db536E194865Af0067::computeLPShares(0, 0, 0, 10000000, 20000001, 112045541900000000000000000000) (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:193)
      │  └╴← (10000000, 10000000, 19999999)
      ├╴call 0x9cC6334F1A7Bc20c9Dde91Db536E194865Af0067::computeLPShares(0, 0, 0, 10000001, 20000000, 112045541900000000000000000000) (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:197)

      │  └╴← (40000000, 20000000, 40000000)
      └╴call 0x9cC6334F1A7Bc20c9Dde91Db536E194865Af0067::computeLPShares(60000000, 30000000, 60000000, 20000000, 40000000, 158456325000000000000000000000) (contracts/tests/.AloeBlend.t.sol:212)
         └╴← (40000000, 20000000, 40000000)
```

    ├─ [41653] FactoryFake::create(0xf1b63cd9d80f922514c04b0fd0a30373316dd75b, 0x8e35ec3f2c8e14bf7a0e67ea6667f6965938ad2d, 0x908f6df3df3c25365172f350670d055541ec362e)
    │   ├─ → new <Unknown>@0x9cc6…0067
    │   │   ├─ [0] 0xf1b6…d75b::0dfe1681()
    │   │   │   └─ ← ()

nvm...I keep forgetting I must pass `--rpc-url $ETH_RPC_URL`..
